hello.text: I haven't slept in days.{n}Or nights, for the matter.

how.name: How are you feeling ?
how.text: I just told you.{n}I've been clawing at my fur for ages but it still bites.

what.name: What happened recently ?
what.text: I've been hunting in farms near the human village.{n}Last time I slept was there, in a haystack.

check.name: Check out her skin
check.narrator: {i}You notice packs of skin without fur,{n}as well as a few bugs here and there.{s}

prosthesis.name: Give her a cone.
prosthesis.narrator: {i}This cone should avoid her scratching too much,{n}but she looks annoyed at the idea.{s}

prosthesis.name: Give her a prosthesis.
prosthesis.narrator: {i}You lose precious time making plans for a useless contraption.{n}It looks like her state has worsen meanwhile...{s}

medicine.name: Give her a vermifuge.
medicine.text: Ah, thank you.{n}I can already hear them stop bugging me.

medicine.name: Give her some coffee.
medicine.narrator: {i}You give her some coffee to wake her up.{n}Now she isn't drowsy anymore.{s}
